quotes.quote: He allegedly sought to use the very security assistance dollars appropriated by Congress to create stability in the world, to help root out corruption and to protect our national security interests, for his own personal gain,

To me, that’s far more important than their declaration.

quote.quote: There’s already a high level of global attention,

sort of a first cousin of SARS,

They are taking it very seriously. I still don’t think this is as bad as SARS, but it’s worse than they originally portrayed it.

The process it has to go through is more like high hurdles with a thousand hurdles along the way,
This was a matter of not if, but when.

quotes.quote: pay for themselves
The overwintering concentration of butterflies in the property is a superlative natural phenomenon,

The millions of monarch butterflies that return to the property every year bend tree branches by their weight, fill the sky when they take flight, and make a sound like light rain with the beating of their wings. Witnessing this unique phenomenon is an exceptional experience of nature.
the soul of the dead,

quote.quote: This agreement helps achieve our goals of fairly compensating wildfire victims, protecting customers’ bills and emerging from Chapter 11.
with insufficient financial flexibility to make billions of dollars in critically needed safety investments.

While PG&E has made substantial progress in resolving victim claims and restructuring our finances, additional changes to the plan are forthcoming. We will continue to engage with the governor’s office to address his concerns,

nvestor groups have hijacked the bankruptcy process to ensure that they reap billions more in profits while individual fire victims receive cents on the dollar, are paid in installments, and have their recoveries funded in large part by stock in the restructured PG&E,
Fire victims do not want to own any part of the company that burned their homes and killed their neighbors.

always gave the president the unvarnished truth,
John’s an honest guy. He’s a man of integrity and great character, so we’ll see what happens.

I do not recall ever hearing people complain that he made up stuff.
I think Bolton has a lot of credibility,
Not just among the Republicans but our side as well.

A month ago, he was against testifying. Now that his book is complete and available for $29.95, he’s all for testifying. So I think we need to take with a grain of salt his testimony if he comes in.
one of my closest friends

a straight shooter, he’s an honest man, he’s an honorable man.

Before, these projects were all just about keeping the weather out,

Engineers would be told, ‘This is the weather, this is the wind speed, these are the restrictions.’ But now these projects are about using architecture as a means of improving both well-being and operational efficiency.

Engineers would be told, ‘This is the weather, this is the wind speed, these are the restrictions.’ But now these projects are about using architecture as a means of improving both well-being and operational efficiency.

Just to prepare for field work, scientists receive training in one building, collect field equipment in another building, pick up a snowmobile in a separate building and fuel it in another location,
The more we spend to keep the buildings going, the fewer resources we have to get researchers out in the field,
how the approach to these projects has changed so dramatically in such a short period of time.
